snippet: Investigators looked into the possibility of arson in the blaze on the Jersey Shore, but ruled that out, saying the cause was a heat source failure of live wiring.
abstract: Investigators determine devastating fire that consumed several blocks of the Boardwalk in Seaside Park, NJ,  was caused by an electrical wiring problem, and was not set intentionally; say  cause was malfunction of electrical wiring that may have been compromised by water and sand from Hurricane Sandy.
lead_paragraph: Investigators looked into the possibility of arson in the blaze on the Jersey Shore, but ruled that out, saying the cause was a heat source failure of live wiring.

headline.main: Boardwalk Fire Ruled Accidental, With Hurricane as a Factor
headline.print_headline: Boardwalk Fire Ruled Accidental, With Hurricane as a Factor
